The parents of an individual with an autosomal recessive condition each carry one copy of the mutated gene, but they typically do not show signs and symptoms of the condition.",GHR,succinyl-CoA:3-ketoacid CoA transferase deficiency
What are the treatments for succinyl-CoA:3-ketoacid CoA transferase deficiency ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of succinyl-CoA:3-ketoacid CoA transferase
